bs-insertmagic-desc: Adds a dialogue allowing the insertion of magic words and tags
bs-insertmagic-newsectionlink: Adds a link ('+' by default) beside the 'edit' tab for adding a new section on a non-talk page.
bs-insertmagic-nonewsectionlink: Removes the link beside the 'edit' tab on pages in talk namespaces.
bs-insertmagic-defaultsort: Used for categorising pages, sets a default category sort key.
apihelp-bs-insertmagic-data-store-summar: Lists all items for the InsertMagic dialogue
